# go list should report import "C"
go list -f '{{.Imports}}' x.go
! stdout runtime/cgo
! stdout unsafe
! stdout syscall
stdout C

# go list -compiled should report imports in compiled files as well,
# adding "runtime/cgo", "unsafe", and "syscall" but not dropping "C".
go list -compiled -f '{{.Imports}}' x.go
stdout runtime/cgo
stdout unsafe
stdout syscall
stdout C


-- x.go --
package x
import "C"
